column1: What mnemonic helps remember the order of sharps added (F-C-G-D-A-E-B)?
column2: Father Charles Goes Down And Ends Battle

column1: The mnemonic Father Charles Goes Down And Ends Battle helps you remember what?
column2: The order of sharps added: F-C-G-D-A-E-B

column1: What mnemonic helps remember the order of flats added (B-E-A-D-G-C-F)?
column2: Battle Ends And Down Goes Charles' Father (reverse of the sharps mnemonic)

column1: The mnemonic Battle Ends And Down Goes Charles' Father helps you remember what?
column2: The order of flats added: B-E-A-D-G-C-F

column1: What mnemonic helps remember the major sharp keys (G-D-A-E-B-F♯-C♯)?
column2: Good Dogs Always Eat Before Fighting Cats

column1: The mnemonic Good Dogs Always Eat Before Fighting Cats helps you remember what?
column2: The major sharp keys in order: G (1♯), D (2♯), A (3♯), E (4♯), B (5♯), F♯ (6♯), C♯ (7♯)

column1: What mnemonic helps remember the major flat keys (F-B♭-E♭-A♭-D♭-G♭-C♭)?
column2: Father Brown Eats Apple Dumplings Greedily, Child

column1: The mnemonic Father Brown Eats Apple Dumplings Greedily, Child helps you remember what?
column2: The major flat keys in order: F (1♭), B♭ (2♭), E♭ (3♭), A♭ (4♭), D♭ (5♭), G♭ (6♭), C♭ (7♭)

column1: What mnemonic helps remember the 3 enharmonic sharp minors (G♯-D♯-A♯)?
column2: Get Down Already (because they're down in the circle!)

column1: The mnemonic Get Down Already helps you remember what?
column2: The 3 enharmonic sharp minor keys: G♯ minor (5♯), D♯ minor (6♯), A♯ minor (7♯)

column1: What mnemonic helps remember treble clef lines (E-G-B-D-F)?
The mnemonic Every Good Boy Does Fine helps you remember what?
column2: Treble clef lines from bottom to top: E-G-B-D-F

column1: What mnemonic helps remember treble clef spaces (F-A-C-E)?
The mnemonic FACE helps you remember what?
column2: Treble clef spaces from bottom to top: F-A-C-E

column1: What mnemonic helps remember bass clef lines (G-B-D-F-A)?
The mnemonic Good Boys Do Fine Always helps you remember what?
column2: Bass clef lines from bottom to top: G-B-D-F-A

column1: What mnemonic helps remember bass clef spaces (A-C-E-G)?
The mnemonic All Cows Eat Grass helps you remember what?
column2: Bass clef spaces from bottom to top: A-C-E-G

column1: How are the sharps and flats order mnemonics related?
column2: They're palindromes! Father Charles Goes Down And Ends Battle reversed gives Battle Ends And Down Goes Charles' Father
